attributes.action: widen or improve ALL the existing motorways and get this country moving again!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The time has come to widen or improve ALL the existing motorways and get this country moving again! Prioritize ~ speed up all repairs, widening, improvements, build new motorways and consider using overhead lanes. The M1,M4,M6 and M25 are nightmares, these motorways are the arteries of the country, come on get them moving again now!
